ing: 3 ounces sangrita (Mexican-style bloody mary mix with orange and lime)
1 pinch Mexican-style chili powder with lime (such as TajinÂ® fruit seasoning)
des: "If you are looking for a real Mexican cocktail, you just found it! This drink combines, in one glass, the best of Mexico: tequila and sangrita (Mexican's favorite tequila chaser). Don't look for cheap tequila; if you like the good stuff, don't be afraid to mix it."
ins: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes; pour in tequila, sangrita, citrus soda, lime juice, and fruit seasoning powder. Stir to mix well.
